name: Cem Karaca
description: '''Muhtar Cem Karaca''' (5 April 1945 – 8 February 2004) was a Turkish legendary [[rock music|rock]] musician and one of the most important figures in the [[Anatolian rock]] movement. He was a graduate of [[Robert College]]. He worked with various Turkish rock bands such as Apaşlar, Kardaşlar, Moğollar and Dervişan. With these bands, he brought a new understanding and interpretation to Turkish rock.
